channel.title: Comments on: Site re-design for The Girl Next Door Grows Up
channel.description: The best new WordPress Genesis things

item.title: By: Nick Davis
item.dc:creator: Nick Davis
item.description:
In reply to <a href="https://genesiswp.guide/listings/site-re-design-for-the-girl-next-door-grows-up/#comment-616">Erika Quagliano</a>.
Hey Erika, thanks so much for sharing the site!
I've included it my latest round-up also: http://genesiswp.guide/2016-09-17/
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Erika Quagliano.

Hey Erika, thanks so much for sharing the site!

I’ve included it my latest round-up also: http://genesiswp.guide/2016-09-17/

item.title: By: Erika Quagliano
item.dc:creator: Erika Quagliano
item.description: One more thing! I would love some feedback - if anyone sees anything I've missed. I tested it on different screens, but please let me know if you see anything. Thank you so much!!
item.content:encoded: One more thing! I would love some feedback – if anyone sees anything I’ve missed. I tested it on different screens, but please let me know if you see anything. Thank you so much!!

item.title: By: Erika Quagliano
item.dc:creator: Erika Quagliano
item.description: I just wanted to create a bold, yet minimal (if that's possible!) theme for my personal blog to keep the focus on the words, yet let the personality of the blog (me) come through. I made subtle changes throughout to just give it a little pop.
item.content:encoded: I just wanted to create a bold, yet minimal (if that’s possible!) theme for my personal blog to keep the focus on the words, yet let the personality of the blog (me) come through. I made subtle changes throughout to just give it a little pop.
